actions.name: Validate JSON
actions.description: Validates JSON files for empty 'author' fields, ID length, duplicate IDs, and duplicate port values in module options. Checks for specific conditions while excluding certain IDs and provides detailed feedback in the GitHub step summary. Ensures data integrity and consistency across JSON configurations.

actions.name: Build Debian
actions.description: Builds Debian packages for Armbian configuration and executes unit tests. Utilizes a reusable workflow to compile the package with specified dependencies and metadata. Runs unit tests conditionally based on the repository owner.

actions.name: Build docs
actions.description: Builds documentation and a main JSON file for the project. Assembles modules and jobs for production, generates documentation using armbian-config, and creates a pull request for the updates. The process includes a commit message and details about the generated documentation and JSON files.

actions.name: Check coding style
actions.description: Checks coding style for pull requests by running an EditorConfig checker. Ensures that code adheres to defined style guidelines before merging.

actions.name: Clean workflow logs
actions.description: Cleans up workflow logs by deleting runs older than a specified number of days, helping to manage storage and maintain a tidy environment. It can be executed on a schedule or manually with input parameters for customization.
actions.cron_schedule: at 0 minutes past the hour, at 0:00, on Mon

actions.name: Community welcome issue
actions.description: Generates a welcome message for first-time contributors when they open an issue. It labels the issue as 'Good first issue' and sends a personalized message to encourage engagement with the project. This enhances community interaction and supports new contributors.

actions.name: Lint
actions.description: Performs Shell script analysis to identify linting errors using Shellcheck on modified files in a repository. It checks for Bash shebangs and generates a report in diff format for any errors found. The analysis is limited to files that have changed in pull requests or all shell scripts if no changes are detected.

actions.name: PR auto-label
actions.description: Automatically labels pull requests based on size, file categories, and creation date, while also removing the 'Ready to merge' label when applicable. It categorizes PRs by analyzing changed lines, matching files to a configuration, and determining the quarter based on the creation month. The workflow ensures that PRs are appropriately labeled for better tracking and organization.

actions.name: PR label on approval
actions.description: Labels pull requests as 'Ready to merge' upon approval and removes review-related labels. It fetches the pull request number from a previous workflow run and applies the appropriate labels based on approval status. Additionally, it cleans up any existing review-related labels to streamline the pull request's status.

actions.name: PR listen review
actions.description: Saves the pull request number when a review is approved and uploads it as an artifact. This allows tracking of approved pull requests for further processing or reporting.

actions.name: Stale
actions.description: Closes inactive issues by marking them as stale after a period of inactivity and subsequently closing them if no updates are made. It sends notifications to contributors about the status of their issues. This helps maintain a clean and active issue tracker.
actions.cron_schedule: at 0 minutes past the hour, at 12:00, on Mon

actions.name: Sync labels
actions.description: Syncs labels from a YAML file to issues and pull requests based on modifications. Applies labels defined in '.github/labels.yml' when changes occur in the specified file or upon manual invocation. Utilizes a GitHub Action to manage label application, ensuring that the correct labels are assigned according to the repository's configuration.
actions.execution_method: workflow_dispatch, push to main branch, pull_request

actions.name: Unit tests
actions.description: Runs unit tests for the Armbian configurator across multiple OS variants and Docker images. It prepares a deployment matrix based on changed test files or schedules, executes the tests in a containerized environment, and uploads the results. Finally, it merges and summarizes the test artifacts for reporting.
actions.cron_schedule: at 0 minutes past the hour, at 2:00

actions.name: Watchdog (cronjob)
actions.description: Reruns failed jobs for specified scripts in a GitHub Actions workflow, ensuring stability by monitoring and restarting workflows as needed. It checks the status of previous runs and attempts to rerun failed jobs up to a defined number of attempts.
